text:
@realDonaldTrump Jared Kushner at briefing, praises his father-in-law's response to the Coronavirus: "The president has been very hands-on..."

It doesn’t take a “stable genius” to figure out that the worst human being in American history has caused the worst disaster in recent history! https://t.co/VWpx3foG6p
